content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Resource Depot & Smelting Facility at base position (x=-4.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-4.5, y=18.5) serving as the central storage depot.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-3.0, y=19.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates (status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warning: ["no ingredients to smelt"]).
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-4.0, y=21.0) used for processing copper ore into copper plates (status: NO_FUEL; warning: ["out of fuel"]).

### Automation Lab & Steam Power System (Integrated System)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (x=-7.5, y=18.5) used for automation research (status: NO_RESEARCH_IN_PROGRESS).
- Boiler at position (x=-5.5, y=24.0) used for generating steam (status: NO_FUEL; warning: ["out of fuel"]).
- Generator (Steam Engine) at position (x=-0.5, y=24.5) converting steam into electrical power (status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]).
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-7.5, y=25.5) supplying water to the system.
- Electricity Group (id=640) supporting power distribution with small electric poles at positions (x=-0.5, y=11.5), (x=0.5, y=14.5), (x=-7.5, y=15.5), (x=-5.5, y=18.5), (x=-8.5, y=21.5) and (x=-2.5, y=24.5) (voltage: 33).
- Pipe Groups forming the fluid network:
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1304) at position (x=-10.5, y=16.5) with pipes at positions (x=-10.5, y=16.5), (x=-9.5, y=17.5), (x=-9.5, y=16.5), (x=-9.5, y=19.5) and (x=-9.5, y=18.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1305) at position (x=-12.5, y=18.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1307) at position (x=-8.5, y=20.5) carrying water with pipes at positions (x=-8.5, y=20.5), (x=-7.5, y=21.5), (x=-7.5, y=20.5), (x=-7.5, y=23.5), (x=-7.5, y=22.5) and (x=-7.5, y=24.5) (status: FULL_OUTPUT).
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1309) at position (x=-2.5, y=21.5) with representative pipes at positions (x=-2.5, y=21.5), (x=-1.5, y=21.5) and (x=-0.5, y=21.5) (status: EMPTY).

No new structures were successfully built in the recent steps.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
- Piping and Connection Issues:
  • Verify that connection points between boilers and steam engines are unobstructed and correctly aligned before attempting pipe attachments.
  • Recheck both source and target compatibility to ensure valid fluid transfer between components.

- Entity Placement and Inventory Checks:
  • Confirm that the target build location is buildable and unoccupied before placing any entity.
  • Validate inventory counts to ensure required items (for example, assembling-machine-1) are available prior to placement attempts.

- Crafting Ingredient Dependencies:
  • Ensure that all prerequisite sub-ingredients—such as iron plates (for both assembling machines and electronic circuits)—are available or producible through active smelting.
  • Maintain steady operation of processing facilities to secure the supply of fundamental materials for crafting advanced items.

- Electrical Network Stability:
  • Monitor and verify that all interconnected electrical components (including electric poles) are correctly connected to sustain a positive voltage output.
  
- General Best Practices:
  • Consistently validate target tile conditions and reference points to avoid placement errors.
  • Proactively check resource availability to prevent failures in both crafting and fluid/power network connections.
